show.title: SAMARITANS
show.sharing_text: हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा
show.sharing_text_v2:
हेलो! मैंने कुकू एफएम पर इस शो को सुना और मेरे ख्‍याल से आपको भी पसंद आएगा 
https://kukufm.com/show/samaritans/?utm_source=share_sh
show.description: When a group of four co-workers meet face to face for the first time to work on a new app, a mysterious entity pits them against each other in a game of truth or dare forcing them to reveal their darkest secrets about each other.
show.description_secondary: When a group of four co-workers meet face to face for the first time to work on a new app, a mysterious entity pits them against each other in a game of truth or dare forcing them to reveal their darkest secrets about each other.
